result.eng: She is famous all over the world.
result.ga: Tá cáil uirthi ar fud an domhain
result.orig: Tá cáil uirthi ar fud an domhain
result.html: Tá cáil uirthi ar fud an domhainShe is famous all over the world.
result.ponchtml: Tá cáil uirṫi ar fud an doṁainShe is famous all over the world.

result.eng: I am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.
result.ga: Tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásach
result.orig: Tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásach
result.html: Tá brón orm ach tá tuirse an domhain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásachI am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.
result.ponchtml: Tá brón orm aċ tá tuirse an doṁain orm agus tá an aimsir uafásaċI am sorry, but I am extremely tired and the weather is awful.

result.eng: She stretched her limbs and took a deep breath.
result.ga: Bhain sí searradh as a géaga agus tharraing anáil dhomhain
result.orig: Bhain sí searradh as a géaga agus tharraing anáil dhomhain
result.html: Bhain sí searradh as a géaga agus tharraing anáil dhomhainShe stretched her limbs and took a deep breath.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain sí searraḋ as a géaga agus ṫarraing anáil ḋoṁainShe stretched her limbs and took a deep breath.

result.eng: The wrinkles on his forehead looked deeper.
result.ga: Bhí cuma ní ba dhoimhne ar na roic ina éadan
result.orig: Bhí cuma ní ba dhoimhne ar na roic ina éadan
result.html: Bhí cuma ní ba dhoimhne ar na roic ina éadanThe wrinkles on his forehead looked deeper.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cuma ní ba ḋoiṁne ar na roic ina éadanThe wrinkles on his forehead looked deeper.
